Name: Qualifications of individuals to perform periodic inspection, test and maintenance fire and smoke dampers and smoke control systems.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city fire and building codes and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the qualifications of individuals to perform periodic inspection, test and maintenance fire and smoke dampers and smoke control systems
BodyName: Committee on Fire and Emergency Management

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Fire and Emergency Management
